4305210.name: Trials of Liberation
4305210.description:
Do you have what it takes to earn your freedom?

In Trials of Liberation, the king turns your escape into entertainment.
Imprisoned and given a single chance, you must face a series of carefully crafted puzzle trials designed to test your logic, planning, and ability to adapt.

Each trial is a step closer to freedom… or another failed attempt for the king’s amusement.

The Trials

Each trial places you inside a self-contained dungeon room with a clear goal and a limited set of tools.

You are given specific items to solve the puzzle. These items are limited, and how you use them matters just as much as when you use them. There are no random solutions; every room is carefully designed around planning, observation, and smart decision-making.

Game Modes

Trials of Liberation offers different ways to face the trials, adapting to your playstyle and the level of challenge you are looking for.

Normal Mode
The core experience of the game. Solve puzzles at your own pace, learn the mechanics, and advance from one trial to the next on your path to freedom.

Hardcore Mode
A challenge designed for the most skilled players. The trials leave little room for error, and every decision can mean the difference between moving forward… or starting over under the king’s watchful eye.

Speedrun Mode
Made for players who want to optimize every move. Complete the trials as fast as possible, master the routes, and beat your own best times with each run.

Key Features

  • Logic-driven puzzle gameplay
    Handcrafted challenges focused on planning, observation, and smart decision-making.

  • Limited-use items and tools
    Solve each trial using a specific set of resources where every use matters.

  • Multiple game modes
    Play at your own pace in Normal Mode, push your limits in Hardcore Mode, or optimize every move in Speedrun Mode.
